summary: Salian Manor is a Mulitple Adoption/Lore Friendly Player Home Located just outside of Solitude overlooking Katla's Farm, it includes plenty of safe Storage, Display Areas for all the Black Books, Elder Scrolls, Dragon Priest Masks, Claws and Paragons, Armory Area with Plenty of Armor Mannequins, 6 Beds for Children, 6 Beds for Followers and muc
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][color=#ffff00]I am currently no longer modding or supporting my original Skyrim mods..Check out my new/ported mods for Skyrim Special Edition[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/6942439/?tb=mods&pUp=1] HERE [/url][color=#ffff00] or Fallout 4[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/users/6942439/?tb=mods&pUp=1]HERE..[/url][color=#ffff00]Thank you again for everyone's continuing support..[/color][/b][/size]

[b][color=red]This Mod Requires Dawnguard, Hearthfire & Dragonborn DLC's[/color][/b]
[b]
Salian Manor is a Medium Sized, Mulitple Adoption/Lore Friendly Player Home Located just outside of Solitude overlooking Katla's Farm, it includes plenty of Safe Storage, Display Areas for all the Black Books, Elder Scrolls, Dragon Priest Masks, Claws and Paragons, Armory Area with Plenty of Armor Mannequins, 6 Beds for Children, 18 Beds for Followers and much more..[/b]

[b][color=red]This Home is Compatible With [/color][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions by TMPhoenix[/url]
[b]NOTE: To move your Children/Spouse into Silian Manor:
1. Download Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions by TMPhoenix
2. Enter Silian Manor and use the "Bless Home" Spell that comes from that mod
3. Talk to your Children/Spouse about moving into your "New Home"[/b]

[b][color=red]---------------------MAIN FEATURES------------------------[/color][/b]

[b]Buy Silian Manor for 5000 gold to obtain the Key and Deed to your new home.
NOTE: Cheat Strongbox with a Key and Deed is located at Katla's Farm in the Windmill structure (see picture)
Navmeshed Indoor and Exteriors
Optimimized with Room Bounds and Portals
Compatible with Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions by Tm Phoenix 9
Change your Characters Appearance (Mirror in the Bath/Shower Area)
Auto Access/Store for Hearthfire Oven/Cooking Pot (Storage Barrel in the Kitchen)
Auto Access/Store for Alchemy Tables/Ingredients (Themed Ingredient Containers)
Auto Access/Store for Enchanting Tables/Soul Gems (Themed Soul Gem Containers)
Auto Access/Store for All Smithing Workstations (Storage Barrel in the Smithing Area beside the Armor Workbench)
NOTE: Storing a TON of stuff in the Auto Store/Access Containers may cause
the Workstations to pause or exit while loading/returning items
Teleport Spell Tome (Found in the Master Bedroom on the cupboard by the Amulet Displays)
Exterior Drop-Off Chest (Linked chest is in the Smithing Area)
Basement Cell w/ Seperate Trapdoor Exterior Entrance
Followers Barracks
Auxilary Armory
6 Beds for Children
18 Beds for Followers
82 Armor Mannequins
265 Weapon Racks
18 Weapon Plaques
66 Shield Plaques
7 Bookshelves (308 Books)
Lightable Fireplaces
Plumbed Sinks and Shower
NPCs undress/re-dress when in Bath and Shower Areas
Add/Remove Food Static Clutter from the Dinning table (Button Switch in the Dining Room Area)
Kitchen Area with Hearthfire Oven and Cooking Pot
Themed Storage for Vegetables, Fruits, Salt Piles, Wines, Meads, Misc. Cooking Supplies and a Barrel for Raw Meats
Enchanting Table w/ Themed Storage for Scrolls, Soul Gems and a Jewerly Strongbox
Imbuing Chamber for making Spider Scrolls w/ Themed Storage for Albino Spider Pods, Safe for Gems and Journal with all the Recipes
Staff Enchanter w/ Themed Storage for Unenchanted Staves, Heartstones
Alchemy Table w/ Themed Storage for Ingredients and Potions
Exterior Garden Area w/ Hearthfire Style Planting Soils (10 Plots)
Trophy Room W/ Hidden Wardrove Entrance (Wardrove to the right of the Master Bed next to the Safe)
Display Area for 13 Dragon Priest Masks
Display Area for all 7 Black Books
Display Area for all 3 Elder Scrolls
Display Area for all 5 Paragons
Display Area for all the Daedric Artifacts
Display Area for all 10 Dragon Claws & Right/Left Amethyst Claws
Themed Storage for Notes, Journals, Spell Tomes, Unique/Rare Books (Master Bedroom)
Displays for Amulets (Nine Divines, Saarthal, Gauldur, Kynes Token (Master Bedroom)
Displays for Bug Jars (Enchanting/Alchemy Area)
All Standing Stones and Shrines of the Divines (Shelves on Top Floor)
Indoor Smithing Area with Forge, Smelter, Sharpening Wheel, Armor Workbench, Tanning Rack
Themed Storage for Armors, Shields, Helmets, Gauntlets, Boots
Themed Storage for Maces, Battle Axes, Swords, Greatswords, Bows, Crossbows
War Axes, Daggers, Warhammers, Arrows, Bolts
Exterior Drop-off Chest (Linked to the chest under the Armor Workbench in the Smithing Area)[/b]

[center][b][color=dodgerblue]Special thanks to Just Call Me Frosty for the video review of Silian Manor..[/color][/b][/center]
[center][youtube]82P0SJLBRVQ[/youtube][/center]

[b][color=red]---------------------Change Log------------------------[/color][/b]

V1.1 Features:
Buy Silian Manor for 5000 gold to obtain the Key and Deed to your new home.
NOTE: Cheat Strongbox with a Key and Deed is located at Katla's Farm in the Windmill structure (see picture)
A New Basement Cell w/ Seperate Trapdoor Exterior Entrance
New Followers Barracks (12 additional Beds)
New Auxilary Armory includes:
+52 Mannequins
+193 Wepon Racks
+34 Display Cases
+48 Shield Plaques
Basement Bath and Kitchen
New Teleport Spell Tome (Found in the Master Bedroom on the cupboard by the Amulet Displays)
Now Optimimized with Room Bounds and Portals
NPCs undress/re-dress when in Bath and Shower Areas
New Walls and Gates around the Exterior Parameter of the home
Kids should now sleep in their Beds
Other Minor Additions and Exterior Landscaping

Install
---------------------------------
1. Download with NMM.
2. Manually install contents of archive in Skyrim/Data folder.

Uninstall
---------------------------------
Make sure to save outside of the cell being uninstalled.

1. Use NMM
2. Delete the SilianManor.esp and any other files from this mod from your Skyrim/Data folder.

[color=red][b]Compatibility:[/b][/color]
[b]This mods location is not compatible with:
Buyable Paintings and Pictures - Place Anywhere by Iceburg[/b]
